casebody.data:
BOYNTON v. KEESEVILLE ELECTRIC LIGHT & POWER CO. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. May 8, 1894.) Action by Adalbert W. Boynton against the Keeseville Electric Light & Power Company.

Argued before MAYHAM, P. J., and PUTNAM and HERRICK, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs. See 25 N. Y. Supp. 741.
